org.spongepowered.api.text.title

Class Title

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.spongepowered.api.text.title.Title

  • public class Title
extends Object
    Represents an immutable configuration for an in-game title. Instances of this interface can be created through the TitleBuilder by calling Titles.builder().

    All properties of a title are optional - if they are not set it will use the current default values from the client.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Title

        public Title(@Nullable
             Text title,
             @Nullable
             Text subtitle,
             @Nullable
             Integer fadeIn,
             @Nullable
             Integer stay,
             @Nullable
             Integer fadeOut,
             boolean clear,
             boolean reset)
        Constructs a new immutable Title with the specified properties.
        Parameters:
        title - The main title of the title, or null for default
        subtitle - The subtitle of the title, or null for default
        fadeIn - The fade in time of the title, or null for default
        stay - The stay time of the title, or null for default
        fadeOut - The fade out time of the title, or null for default
        clear - true if this title clears the currently displayed one first
        reset - true if this title resets all settings to default first

    • Method Detail

      • getTitle

        public final Optional<Text> getTitle()
        Returns the title of this title configuration.
        Returns:
        The Text of the title, if it was configured

      • getSubtitle

        public final Optional<Text> getSubtitle()
        Returns the subtitle of this title configuration.
        Returns:
        The Text of the subtitle, if it was configured

      • getFadeIn

        public final Optional<Integer> getFadeIn()
        Returns the specified time to fade in the title on the client. Once this period of time is over, the title will stay for the amount of time from getStay().

        The default value for Vanilla is 20 (1 second).

        Returns:
        The amount of ticks (1/20 second) for the fade in effect

      • getStay

        public final Optional<Integer> getStay()
        Returns the specified time how long the title should stay on the client. Once this period of time is over, the title will fade out using the duration specified from getFadeOut().

        The default value for Vanilla is 60 (3 second).

        Returns:
        The amount of ticks (1/20 second) for the stay effect

      • getFadeOut

        public final Optional<Integer> getFadeOut()
        Returns the specified time to fade out the title on the client.

        The default value for Vanilla is 20 (1 second).

        Returns:
        The amount of ticks (1/20 second) for the fade out effect

      • isClear

        public final boolean isClear()
        Returns whether this configuration is clearing the current title from the screen.
        Returns:
        True if the current title will be removed from the client's screen

      • isReset

        public final boolean isReset()
        Returns whether this configuration is clearing the current title from the screen and resetting the current configuration to the default values.

        This is recommended when you want to make sure to display a single title.

        Returns:
        True if the current settings will be reset to the defaults

      • builder

        public TitleBuilder builder()
        Creates a new TitleBuilder using the configuration of this instance.
        Returns:
        A new builder to modify this Title configuration
